synopsis.text: Kokoro's family runs the Himote House in Nakano, Tokyo, where five unique girls and a mystical cat reside together. The Himote sisters, Tokiyo, Kinami, and Kokoro, share their home with Kokoro's classmates, Tae and Minamo, and their enigmatic feline companion, Enishi. The girls navigate their daily lives in pursuit of popularity and finding love, while also concealing their secret powers. Join this diverse group of girls and their cat as they tackle everyday challenges, learn to be more ladylike, and hone their special abilities in this hilarious and heartwarming comedy anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
